meta.name: description
meta.content: It is the mission of the Beekmantown Central School District and its community to educate every individual to be a quality contributor to society and self.

li.a: Chrome Web Store App & Website Access Request Form

img.alt: Two students working intently on their Chromebooks
Three Robotics club members comparing tools to use to build a robot
A class holding the prized candy canes they won by unlocking a box
The Varsity Hockey Team right after winning, huddling around a banner all smiling and hold up their pointer finger to signify being the Number One team in their Championship
Seventh graders matching in their Team Ascent tee-shirts, waiting for an assembly
Library full of students doing school work on their Chromebooks
Three Students working on their math homework using their Chromebooks
Beekmantown football player attempting to block a player from the opposite team from tackling him so he can run with the ball
A group of Team Ascent members in front of their Project Based Learning assignment
Elementary school boys throwing snow in the air whilst enjoying their recess
Cheerleaders lying in a circle, heads touching, smiling up at the camera
Three students working together to build a robot
Chaperones, students and a teacher looking out on a lake while learning the basics of canoeing
Library full of students working on their Chromebooks, many students looking at their neighbors work
Teachers dressed as though sitting in a roller coaster for a Halloween costume
Five students working together on a group project, some talking animatedly and some listening attentively
Three best friends sit on each others lap in their Band class
A group of elementary students bundled up in big jackets visiting the Lake Placid Olympic center. In the background a luge team zooms by
Three rows of students sitting lecture style following a lesson with their Chromebooks
Four canoes full of the Environmental Club students paddle around a lake
Young student wears a paper turkey hat at Thanksgiving lunch
Elijah Magiera smiling in front of his Team Tsunami project
A group of Team Ascent members in front of their Project Based Learning assignment
Two middle school boys stand back to back making funny faces while playing their saxophones
Elementary students smiling together with arms around each other
A group of students surround their snowman creation
Assembly of students sitting on the library floor listening to the Club Overcome Counselor
Beekmantown football player attempting to run with the play without being tackled by a player from the opposite team
A group of Team Ascent members in front of their Project Based Learning assignment
The Beekmantown football team lined up on the side of the field before their game
High school band students preforming at a pep rally
Two female students work together on a Chromebook
Three boys smiling greatly because of an electric, glowing orb
Environmental club poses for a picture outside of a log cabin
Elementary students dressed in elf costumes perform for their Winter concerts
Class of 2017 Graduation ceremony, all students standing, most holding roses
3D Printer printing out the 21st Century Kids logo
Students warming up their musical instruments
The class of 2016 to 2017 listening to a speech by Mr. Mannix, the superintendent, mid-Graduation ceremony
Three tables full of students working in their free period on various assignments
A group of Team Ascent members in front of their Project Based Learning assignment
Young student smiles before playing an educational problem solving game
A volleyball player jumps to spike the ball in a match
Student smiling, watching a video while kids in the background work on building a robot
Four Cumberland Head students smile during their Band class
